com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework

Class SmartAdapters.SmartListAdapter<ViewClass extends android.view.View>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework.SmartAdapters.SmartListAdapter<ViewClass>
  • Type Parameters:
    ViewClass - the class which represents each graphical row of the list
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    SmartAdapters

    public static class SmartAdapters.SmartListAdapter<ViewClass extends android.view.View>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener
    A ListView adapter, which works closely with the SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper.
    Since:
    2012.11.23

      • onInterceptGetView

        protected void onInterceptGetView(ViewClass view,
                      int position,
                      boolean isRecycled)
        Is invoked every time a View of the adapter is being updated. This is the right place for customizing the adapter.
        Parameters:
        view - the view which holds the graphical representation of the business object
        position - the position in the adapter
        isRecycled - true if and only if the provided view has just been created and is hence not recycled
